殑字的基本解释

殑
qíng
死：“瘁肌砭髓魂欲殑。”

殑
jìng
〔殑伽〕梵文印度恒河的音译。

殑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qíng］
［《廣韻》其矜切，平蒸，羣。］
［《廣韻》其拯切，上拯，羣。］
(1)见“殑殑”。
(2)见“殑”。
[②]［jīng］
［《集韻》居陵切，平蒸，見。］
旧谓魂魄出体。
[③]［jìng］
译音字。见“殑3伽”。

殑字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【歹字部】　殑； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页581第09
【玉篇】巨升切【廣韻】其矜切【集韻】巨興切，?音䔷。殑㱡，欲死貌。一曰掣縮也。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?其拯切，音?。又【集韻】其孕切。義?同。　又【集韻】居陵切，音兢。㱥殑，鬼出。　又【廣韻】其?切，䔷去聲。殑伽，河名。《大藏西域記》：阿耨達池，在香山之南，大雪北，周八百里。東南流入海者曰殑伽河，西南流入海者曰縛芻河，西北流入海者曰涉多河。又潛流地下，出積石，東北流入海者，爲中國河源。《釋典》殑伽，華言天堂。見【翻譯名義集】。

殑字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
殑字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Die
qíng
Die: "The muscles and souls want to die."
Die
jìng
〔殑加〕The transliteration of the Sanskrit Indian Ganges.
Die
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qíng］
["Guangyun" its cut, flat steamed, group. ]
["Guangyun" Qi Zhengqi, Shang Zheng, Qun. ]
(1) See "Death".
(2) See "Falling".
[②]［jīng］
["Ji Yun" Ju Ling cut, steamed flat, see. ]
The old said that the soul is out of the body.
[③]［jìng］
Transliterated characters. See "Chan 3 Jia".
Die
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Jixia] [Department of Bad Characters] 　殑; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 581 09
[Jade articles] Jusheng cut [Guangyun] Its 矜切 [Jiyun] Juxing cut,? Yin 䔷.殑㱡, wanting to die. One said to shrink.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Qi Zhengqie, sound?. Also 【Jiyun】It's pregnant and cut. Righteous? Same.　 [Ji Yun] Ju Ling cuts, and the sound is trembling.汥殑, ghost out.　[Guang Yun] It's cut, let's go. Shan Jia, the name of the river. "Dazang Western Regions": Arunda Pond, in the south of Xiangshan, in the north of Daxue, Zhou Babaili. Those who flow into the sea in the southeast are called the Shuga River, those who flow into the sea in the southwest are called the Bupiu River, and those who flow into the sea in the northwest are called the Shedo River. Underwater flows underground, accumulates rocks, and flows into the sea from the northeast, which is the source of the river in China. "Shi Dian" deceased Jia, the Chinese language paradise. See [Translation Name Collection].
